TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET OFFERED EARLY ASSISTANCE
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had invited an early round of bill offers from the discount houses after forecasting a very large shortage of around 1.75 billion stg in the money market today. MORE
